metadata.Title: CVE-2020-1900 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: When unserializing an object with dynamic properties HHVM needs topre-reserve the full size of the dynamic property array before insertinganything into it. Otherwise the array might resize, invalidating previouslystored references. This pre-reservation was not occurring in HHVM prior tov4.32.3, between versions 4.33.0 and 4.56.0, 4.57.0, 4.58.0, 4.58.1,4.59.0, 4.60.0, 4.61.0, 4.62.0.

criterions.comment: hhvm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
